NotificationDTO Data Type

Represents a notification in the system.

Prior to version 28 the template definition and substitution values are provided so the API client can perform substitution. Starting with version 28 the template functionality has been been expanded and substitution is performed on the server and provided back as part of this object in notification_text.

Starting with version 29 the following fields will be removed:

inc_id

inc_training

task_name

task_id

comment_text

comment_id

Properties
name data type description
recipient_muser_id number The user ID of the person who is to receive the notification. The fullOrgDTO (users property) contains a list of all the possible user values.
id number The notification ID.
create_date number The date the notification was created.
email_date number
ack_date number
notification_def NotificationDefDTO
inc_id number
inc_training boolean
inc_name string
task_name string
task_id number
comment_text string
comment_id number
originating_muser_id number The user ID of the person who originated the notification. The fullOrgDTO (users property) contains a list of all the possible user values.
originating_muser_name string The user name of the person who originated the notification.
notification_text string Text of the notification after the notification template has been substituted with values.
originating_object TypedObjectReferenceDTO Object that caused this notification.

Example

{
  "recipient_muser_id" : 12345,
  "id" : 12345,
  "create_date" : 12345,
  "email_date" : 12345,
  "ack_date" : 12345,
  "notification_def" : {
    "id" : 12345,
    "name" : "...",
    "type" : 12345,
    "email" : true,
    "email_body" : "...",
    "data_conditions" : [ {
      "method" : "...",
      "field_name" : "...",
      "value" : { },
      "type" : "...",
      "evaluation_id" : 12345
    }, {
      "method" : "...",
      "field_name" : "...",
      "value" : { },
      "type" : "...",
      "evaluation_id" : 12345
    } ],
    "for_who" : {
      "owners" : true,
      "members" : true,
      "added_owners" : true,
      "removed_owners" : true,
      "added_members" : true,
      "removed_members" : true,
      "parent_owners" : true,
      "parent_members" : true,
      "users" : [ { }, { } ]
    },
    "needs_ack" : true,
    "ack_body" : "...",
    "uuid" : "...",
    "internal" : true,
    "perms" : {
      "revert" : true
    }
  },
  "originating_muser_id" : 12345,
  "originating_muser_name" : "...",
  "notification_text" : "...",
  "originating_object" : {
    "parent" : { },
    "object_id" : 12345,
    "object_name" : "...",
    "type_id" : 12345,
    "type_name" : "..."
  }
}
